pkgmetadata.longdescription: # open## Description ##Open a file, directory, or URI using the OS's default application forthat object type. Optionally, you can specify an application to use.This is a proxy for the following commands: OSX: "open" Windows: "start"Linux/Other: "xdg-open"This is a python port of the node.js module:https://github.com/pwnall/node-open## Import ##```pythonimport open_python```## Usage ##### open google.com in the user's default browser:```pythonopen_python.start("https://google.com/")```### you can specify the program to use:```pythonopen_python.start("https://google.com/", "firefox")```## use in command line```sh$ python -m open_python https://google.com/```## License ##Copyright (c) 2013 skratchdot Licensed under the MIT license.## Contributors ##skratchdotpanda2134
